details.sectionContent: It is the use of control systems for handling different processes and machineries in an industry.
This is a combination of various disciplines of engineering to work on an industrial level and get knowledge of the latest technology.

Participants are required to come with their laptops.
Topics to be covered in this workshop:
	Concept of industrial automation
	Design of automation circuit
	Control board design
	Basic programming knowledge
	Troubleshooting the errors
	On the spot demonstration of Pneumatic and control system from laptops of the participants.
	Understanding of sensors and control units
